page.title: 13Flower Fairies & Piggy
page.content:
When I go to Zara's house I play {Flower Fairies}with her. The Flower Fairy is a little doll and she has a bed chamber, a secret garden, a petal pool, a coach and a horse. Zara has got everything except the petal pool, horse and coach. The Fairies can move.
{Piggy in the Middle}is a good game. 2 people stand away from each other and 1 person stands in the middle of them. The person one end throws the ball to the person the other end and the one in the middle has to try and catch the ball before the other person. If the person in the middle catches the ball, the one who threw it then has to go in the middle.
